item.title: scHiCAR – trimodal single-cell profiling of transcriptome, epigenome and 3D genome
item.description: scHiCAR integrates RNA sequencing, chromatin accessibility, and 3D genome mapping in single cells, enabling high-resolution analysis of enhancer promoter interactions across complex tissues...

item.title: Rubrics, Not Vibes: Consistency as a Feature in Peer Review with AI
item.description: Responsibly using AI for a structured first pass manuscript / grant proposal review can reduce reviewer variance while keeping human judgment central. Bonus: a prompt I use for my own draft proposals.

item.title: Droplet vs picowell – considerations for single-cell transcriptomic profiling
item.description: A head to head comparison of single cell RNA sequencing platforms reveals how droplet and picowell methods differ in preserving epithelial cells and data quality in human colon biopsies...

item.title: AI-enabled gene discovery opens door to personalised psoriasis treatment
item.description: Using RNA sequencing and machine learning, researchers identified gene signatures that define psoriasis subtypes and severity...
